title: Ticket #3395: Condor-C constantly refreshes proxy when delegated lifetime unlimited
description: If HTCondor is configured not to limit the lifetime of a delegated proxy (param DELEGATE_JOB_GSI_CREDENTIALS_LIFETIME or job attribute DelegateJobGSICredentialsLifetime set to 0), then the gridmanager will frequently redelegate the proxy of Condor-C jobs to the remote schedd. The gridmanager's constant redelegation is only limited by GRIDMANAGER_PROXY_REFRESH_INTERVAL, which defaults to 10 minutes.
